field.name: OtherSubject

definition.attribution: Digital Learning Sciences at the University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

field.definition: The topic of the resource not described by a controlled vocabulary.

dos.practice: Select subject keywords (i.e. uncontrolled words or phrases) from either the title or description information or the content of the resource itself. If the subject of the item is a person or an organization, use the same form of the name as you would if the person or organization were a creator or other contributor. Note, however, that names of creators and other contributors should not be included as subjects unless the work is about that person (i.e., it is autobiographical).
When using keywords, choose the most significant and unique terms, avoiding those too general to describe a particular item.
Use this field to augment the selected gemSubject terms or as an alternative field if no gemSubject terms apply.
